snippet: The Boston Bruins are sending Tyler Seguin to the Dallas Stars for another forward, Loui Eriksson, as part of a seven-player trade.
abstract: Boston Bruins are sending Tyler Seguin to Dallas Stars for another forward, Loui Eriksson, as part of a seven-player trade; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins are sending Tyler Seguin to the Dallas Stars for another forward, Loui Eriksson, as part of a seven-player trade.

headline.main: Bruins and Stars Agree on Seven-Player Trade
headline.print_headline: Bruins and Stars Agree on Seven-Player Trade
